title: Asynchronous
summary: The term asynchronous refers to two or more objects or events that do not exist or happen at the same time, that is, they are not synchronous . When multiple related things happen without any being dependent on the completion of previous happenings, they are asynchronous.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
